text: "Hold On" is a 1983 song by English progressive rock band Yes and is the second track from their 11th studio album 90125. It went to number 43 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart and the live version made 27 on the Mainstream Rock chart in 1985. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Yes (band) songs
title: Hold On (Yes song)
